column4: Is there anyway i can get rid of these files that appear in my pictures and music files, which are thumbs.db, ehthumbs.db, and desktoi.ini?
if they are in a Windows OS partition, they will be regenrated when you next access the folder
then they will be recreated next time you access the files
you prefix with a . in linux to hide, windows will just make another as the filename doesn't exist
